law.history: Repealed 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 101, sec. 34. -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 67, sec. 1. -- Amended 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 96, secs. 6 and 7. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 979b-6.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Probation officer to investigate defendant -- Supervision of probationers by Division of Probation and Parole.
